comments.comment: Kaagevath gemak nisaa neveyi UNP eka minisunta epaa velaa hungak kal. Muslim saha demala anthavaadeenta neethiya lihil karala sinhala bauddhayintama neethiya thada karana kota thavath epaa vunaa.  Paasku prahaaraya gena kalin dena gena velekvuve nethi nisaa ETCA SOFa givisum nisaa thava epaa vunaa MCC givisumen raten 1/3 k USA valatayi fedaral valin thava 1/3 k demaluntayi denna yana kota thamayi pita rata vala hiti minissuth evith chande dunne UNP paraddanna.  Janathaavata ranilda sajithda kiyana eka prashnayak neveyi UNP thamayi thibuna ekama prashne. Ratata saamaya ethi kala rajapaksalaata horu minee maruvo kiyakiya hitiyata kisi deyak oppu karanna beri vunaamath minisunta epaa vunaa .  Chanda kal damana kotath epaa vunaa. @Gayanthie Kuruppu yes it's enough,  but don't blame to anyone,  hoyanne balanne netuwa, mataya gena prasnayak neme, tamunla kta karana igena gatanam hodai, ekai, hoyanne balanne netuwa kiyana kata walin jati beda eti wenawa, eka karana epa,

@Gayanthie Kuruppu Tamil catholic leave them,  I'm talking about sinhala catholic,  don't mixed up,  catholic Tamil aya kotintat support kala, nette nene, hebei sinhala catholic ehema karane ne kawadawat,  don't forget it, man kata karanne sinhala catholic gena witarai, Tamil catholic aya gena I don't care,  eyala catholic wenna eti, hebei sinhala neme,

@Gayanthie Kuruppu api Hewwot api kanawa, kaurut pinata kanna denne nene, kauru awat wenne 1ma de, ekma de apita inna ratak ine, hebei unp kaledi tama apita me de une, mamat catholic,  so we are not supporting to unp, don't forget it, we need justice,  that's it, meegamuwe innawa muslims, deyak kiyana kalin podak hitala balana, eka eka agam unata ape jatiya sinhala,

@Gayanthie Kuruppu sajiya ewit pak gahanada bn, moka awat wenne 1ma de, mataka tiya ganin, kohomat ubala wage eun inakan ratata goda emak ne, mokada ubala lide inna gembo wage, lin Katen witarai eliya dakinne,  etanin ehata wenne monawada danne ne, Ekma de hitagena eka etta karanna dagalanna epa, rata okkogema, patu adahas ata erala inna ratak ituru kara ganna hita ganin, netuwa tenin tena eka ekata bena bena, agam beda eti nokara, ratata pilila bn ubala,

Ai catholic eun ube ammata polimak demmada,  gon hutta, rata baudda tama, api ekata garu karanawa, api igena gena tiyenawa, lankawa kiyanne baudda ratak tama, eka edat adat hetat ehemai, e uata oluwe tiyan dagalanna epa, k, agam beda eti karanna kata karana epa, Easter Sunday una de, ubalatat mataka etine, ubala wage narida dudhagama issrahata geniyanna yanne, lejjai
